src:
肉末蒸芋絲 葷素搭配 太香了（視頻）

01 Nov 2019, 02:43

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】肉末蒸芋絲
配料：芋頭壹個，五花肉100克，香菇3朵，鹽3克，生抽8克，胡椒粉1克，蔥花、油適量。
以下YouTube視頻示範：

text:
Minced pork with minced meat, glutinous rice with too much fragrant (video)

01 Nov 2019, 02:43

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 01, 2019] steamed minced pork with minced meat
Ingredients: one taro, 100 grams of pork, 3 mushrooms, 3 grams of salt, 8 grams of soy sauce, 1 gram of pepper, chopped green onion, oil.
The following YouTube video demo:
